ðŸš€ Designed by link builder for link builders:

Time-Saving
Save up to 50 (!) hours per year on link insertion. Our AI-powered tool swiftly analyzes pages and suggests optimal link placements, dramatically reducing the time spent on link-building tasks. Place links smarter, not harder!

Share and track your link status
Share a link to your placement details with clients, teammates, or editors. Stay updated on the live status of your link through Chrome notifications (just give permission) or by checking the shared link.

Enhanced SEO Relevancy
You probably know that Google loves relevant links! The extension's algorithms ensure that your links are placed in the most contextually relevant locations on a page.

AI-Powered Rewriting
Seamlessly integrate your links with our AI rewriting feature. It helps you rephrase sentences to naturally incorporate your links anchors.

Smart Analysis
Utilize the extension's ability to analyze both the source and target pages. It considers factors like keyword distribution, content relevance, and existing link density to suggest the most effective link placements.

ðŸš€ How to get started:

This is a powerful tool for content creators, SEO specialists, and webmasters to manage link insertions, find link building opportunities, and verify link placements
